Key Match Events: Álvarez scored for Argentina in the 49th minute
Lautaro Martínez secured the win for Argentina in the 88th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Canada played the same side that drew 0-0 with France in a friendly
Argentina played their strongest possible side with Lionel Messi and Ángel Di María
Canada’s strategy involved going toe-to-toe with the world’s top side
Post-Match Reflections: Maxime Crépeau made an outstanding save on Di Maria’s one-on-one opportunity
Canada’s goalkeeper continued to deliver one of the most immense performances in recent memory by a Canadian goalkeeper
Canada’s team showed bravery and aggression, matching up astonishingly well with the world’s top side
Canada’s next match will be against Peru on Tuesday, June 25
Miscellaneous Highlights: Alistair Johnston challenges Argentina's Alexis Mac Allister
Canada’s next match will be against Peru on Tuesday, June 25
